title: Spicy Cashew Dressing
ingredients: 2tbsp tamari or coconut aminos (can sub soy sauce)
Optional: 1 tsp of red pepper flakes (if you like more spice)
directions: Add all ingredients to a high speed blender. Blend until smooth.
If dressing is too thick, add up to 2 more tbsp water. Taste and adjust salt/spice level to preference.
